titleStmt.title: [A sweet nosgay, or pleasant posye] [contayning a hundred and ten phylosophicall flowers &c.]
titleStmt.author: Whitney, Isabella.

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Is. W.; attributed to Isabella Whitney by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: filmed from original in the British Library which lacks t.p.; title supplied from caption title, sig. BÂ²; imprint from British Museum catalog. Improved filming over copy at reel 1048:8.
Running title: Sweet nosegay gathered in a philosphicall garden.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
